title: Thunderbird does not recognise my Email Passwords since I updated
content:
I have just updated to the latest Versian of Thunderbird and now it does not recognise my Email Passwords for Plus Net and also Google Every time I log in it asks for my Plus net Password but then it asks me to log in to GOOGLE I put in my Google Password but then a security box comes up but in a Language that I cannot recognise I am in Spain at my Apartment at the moment But it does not look like Spanish

I do not have a clue as to what it is asking me and I do not know what Google has got to do with your Email HOW CAN I SOLVE THIS PLEASE

Yours Sincerely Ron Goldthorpe
creator: 310Jupiter

title: jose antonio montero
content: Saludos, mi problema es que desde hace varios dias no puedo acceder con thunderbir , que es mi gestor de correo para varias cuentas desde hace años, nunca he tenido un problema, hasta hace unos dias, el problema es que, tunderbir, no puede acceder a mi cuenta de hotmail en concreto a esta merlin-mago@hotmail.es las demas si pero esta en cocreto , no, le he cambiado la contraseña y puedo acceder normalmente, pero thunderbird , me dice lo que les envio en la imagen, Podrian ayudarme a solucionar el problema, , muchas gracias,, por cierto he reiniciado , he vuelto a instalar el gestor de correo y las contrasesñas , solo da problema esa cuenta enconcreto, Muchas gracias, espero su respuesta

title: Thunderbird does not recognise my Email Passwords since I updated
content:
I posted a question this morning and got a reply which I read using gmail but could not reply to it and I cannot find were I posted the question or the reply from christ 1 I have copied and pasted my reply below


Ron Goldthorpe <[email]@gmail.com> Attachments 12:33 (2 minutes ago) to no-reply

I put in my Plus net Password and press enter and then it takes me to the next screen see Capture 1 I then put in my Google Internet Password and then press enter and it then takes me to Capture 2 and then I am completely lost I have used Thunderbird in my Spain Apartment and also at home in England for several years and it has never taken me to Google and never come up with another Language Fortunately I have logged into Google Mail and managed to add my Plusnet EMail to this otherwise I would not be able to read your reply without logging into a very Basic Plusnet Webmail

It is the first time I have ever used Google Mail it is not bad but I prefer Thunderbird if I can get it working again

Yours Sincerely Ron Goldthorpe

PS when you reply can you please tell me how to find it in your system 

One attachment  • Scanned by Gmail

title: email sync?
content: I use a PC with Thunderbird and an iPhone with its mail app(Thunderbird not installed on iPhone). Approx 2 weeks ago, I found the mail icon gone from my iPhone. After dealing with Apple and Spectrum(my ISP), mail was restored but not syncing between devices. Prior to that problem, if I deleted an email on my iPhone, it disappeared on my PC, and vice versa. Now I have to manually delete on each device. How do I get back to pre-incident operation?

title: unable to forward with filters without error messages
content:
facing a lot of issues using yahoo mail with thunderbird

filters are not automatically triggered when i turn on thunderbird the first time in the day the filters need to be launched manually

when i am trying to use filters to forward emails from yahoo account, i am getting the same error per email which asks me to put in the password for the yahoo mail which i then cross

first the above error comes and right after there is an error regarding smtp issues and unable to forward which i again cross

after the above the mail then gets forwarded

so if i have 20 odd mails to forward through a filter then i have to cancel/cross 40 dialog boxes to be finish the process

dont know why this is happening everytime

kindly help thanks in advance
creator: praneet.jhun

title: tbird will not save passwords
content:
This is in response to Matt: Yes the login occurs, however sometimes get spinning loading symbol indefinitely....

Added few items: Versions: tbird 102.7.0 win 10 22h2 19045.2486


Conditions: Save box appears below pwd entry box permissions ok on files running tbird as admin

nothing appears in saved passwords box before or after attempt

no win log issue

"normal password" on server imap account hmailserver

this occurred after upgrade tbird purged existing pwds

Tried: deleted key3.db, key4.db, cert9.db and logins.json

no pkcs11.txt file

no external attached pwd manager

Thank you, 

   h
creator: SumoBot

title: Thunderbird Displays Same Email
content:
This morning I opened Thunderbird that I access my Yahoo Mail through. When I click on any message in my inbox it displays the information (to, from, subject, and body) from an email from July 17, 2020. This email has been deleted on Thunderbird and Yahoo and both trashes have been entered. If I delete the new message that should be something else on Thunderbird it disappears from Yahoo Mail as normal.

I recently started using the calendar, about a week ago, and sync it using tbSync with my Apple Calendar. It's been working perfectly and the the calendar is still working. It's just reading messages in my inbox. Messages stored in my folders that are on my hard drive work.

I've confirmed that my webmail access on mail.yahoo.com is still working properly. My email client, Spark, on my phone is still working properly. I have Thunderbird 102.4.2 (64-bit) running on Ubuntu 22.04. I've also restarted and rebooted my computer just in case.
creator: a.hoeppner

title: Moving contact information between address book and mailing list
content:
I have a list for an organization with around 250 contacts. Because Thunderbird has a mailing limit of around 60, I have divided this list into 5 separate address books. (AB 1, AB 2, etc.)

But I see that each address book can have separate mailing lists and I think that would be a better way to go forward.

So instead of having 5 address books, I would have 1 with 5 mailing lists

But I cannot find a way to move or copy the 50 contacts in the individual address books into one of the specific mailing lists. I can move the contacts from each of the existing 5 address books into a single address book – but that leaves me with the original issue.

How can I move these contacts into 5 separate mailing lists under 1 address book?
creator: JCtheWizard

title: Thunderbird cannot find my Key ID when trying to sign a message with external GnuPG
content:
Hello.

I'm trying to set up Thunderbird to use GnuPG installed on my laptop.

Here are relevant settings I changed: ``` mail.identity.default.openpgp_key_id = "goose-new <wbg@angouri.org>" mail.openpgp.allow_external_gnupg = true ```

Then I create a new email, press OpenPGP -> Digitally sign.

Then I press Send.

However, it says ``` Unable to send the message, because there is a problem with your personal key. The configured key ID ‘goose-new <wbg@angouri.org>’ cannot be found on your keyring ```

It is correctly configured in gpg (and I can sign files with it).

Any idea?

(versions: gpg: 2.3.7, thunderbird 102.6.0, OS: NixOS 23.05)
creator: WhiteBlackGoose

title: Undo inconsistent on TB 102.7.0 (MacOS)
content:
I'm running TB 102.7.0 on MacOS Monterey -- for at least a few revisions, I've seen that Undo is inconsistent. At times, it just doesn't work as I believe it should.

Here's an example. You delete a message and select Undo, sometimes you need to refresh the view by navigating to another folder, then back. But often times, I find it just doesn't do anything and I end up manually moving it.

Anyone else see this manifesting?

title: Requires administrator to open Thunderbird
content:
I have just set up Thunderbird as my default email app. (I used EMClient before, which is still on my computer, but my subscription is expired.) When I click on the Thunderbird logo to open the app, I get the message: "Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible." In order to open Thunderbird, I must run as administrator.

I have tried creating a new profile. It still requires running as administrator.

How do I get around this? Thanks for any help.
